MIA (Modular Image Analysis)

Modular, object-based analysis for ImageJ/Fiji

Merge channels

Description

Parameters

  • Add image
    • Type: ParameterGroup
  • Overwrite mode
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: Create new image
    • Choices:
      • Create new image
      • Overwrite image
  • Output image
    • Type: OutputImageP
  • Image index to overwrite (>= 1)
    • Type: IntegerP
    • Default value: 1
